edu.ucla.sspace.vector

Class VectorIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.vector.VectorIO

  • public class VectorIO
extends Object
    A shared utility for printing Vectors and arrays to files in a uniform manner.
    Author:
    David Jurgens

    • Method Detail

      • readDoubleArray

        public static double[] readDoubleArray(File f)
                                throws IOException
        Read a double array from the specified file. is interpreted as a plain text file with array values separated by whitespace.
        Parameters:
        f - A whitespace separated file of double values.
        Returns:
        A double array of values in f.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • toString

        public static String toString(Vector vector)
        Convert a Vector to a String where values are separated by spaces.
        Parameters:
        vector - An Vector of values to convert.
        Returns:
        A String representing vector.

      • writeVector

        public static void writeVector(int[] vector,
               PrintWriter pw)
                        throws IOException
        Write the values of an integer array to the destination stored by a PrintWriter.
        Parameters:
        vector - The integer array to write out.
        pw - A PrintWriter to write values to.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeVector

        public static void writeVector(int[] vector,
               File f)
                        throws IOException
        Write the values of an integer array to the the specified File.
        Parameters:
        vector - The integer array to write out.
        f - A PrintWriter to write values to.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeVector

        public static void writeVector(int[] vector,
               String word,
               File outputDir)
                        throws IOException
        Creates a file using the provided word name in the given output directory. All "/" characters are replaced with -SLASH-.
        Parameters:
        vector - The integer array to write out.
        word - The name of the file to write values to, with .vector as the extension type.
        outputDir - The directory where .vector will be created.
        Throws:
        IOException
